00040 #include <QCloseEvent>
00041 #include <QDateTime>
00042 #include <QSettings>
00043 #include <QTime>

00045 #include "MapDialog.h"
00046 #include "SunPositionCalculatorDialog.h"
00047 #include "tgc.h"

00049 SunPositionCalculatorDialog::SunPositionCalculatorDialog( QWidget* parent )
00050 : QDialog( parent )
00051 {
00052         setupUi(this);
00053 
00054 
00055         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( clicked( QAbstractButton* ) ), this, SLOT( UpdatePosition( QAbstractButton* ) ) );
00056 
00057 
00058         connect( calendarWidget, SIGNAL( selectionChanged( ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeDate( ) ) );
00059 
00060         connect( utTime, SIGNAL( timeChanged( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeSunTime( QTime ) ) );
00061         connect( ctTime, SIGNAL( timeChanged( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeSunTime( QTime ) ) );
00062         connect( zoneSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged( int ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeSunTimeZone( int ) ) );
00063 
00064         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged(  double ) ), this, SLOT( ChangeLongitude( double ) ) );
00065         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged(  double ) ), worldMap, SLOT( LocalLongitudeChanged( double ) ) );
00066         connect( latitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged( double) ), this, SLOT( ChangeLatitude( double ) ) );
00067         connect( latitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged(  double ) ), worldMap, SLOT( LocalLatitudeChanged( double ) ) );
00068 
00069         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), worldMap, SLOT( SunChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00070 
00071         ReadSettings();
00072 }
00073 
00074 SunPositionCalculatorDialog::~SunPositionCalculatorDialog()
00075 {
00076         WriteSettings();
00077 }
00078 
00079 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* event )
00080 {
00081         WriteSettings();
00082         event->accept();
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::UpdatePosition( QAbstractButton* button )
00087 {
00088         if( buttonBox->buttonRole( button ) == QDialogButtonBox::ApplyRole )
00089         {
00090                 //Fecha y Hora
00091                 QDateTime time = GetTime();
00092 
00093                 int year = time.date().year();
00094                 int month = time.date().month();
00095                 int day = time.date().day();
00096 
00097                 double hours = time.time().hour ();
00098                 double minutes = time.time().minute ();
00099                 double seconds = time.time().second ();
00100                 cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00101 
00102                 //Localization
00103                 double longitude = longitudeSpin->value();
00104                 double latitude = latitudeSpin->value();
00105             cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00106 
00107                 //Calculate sun position
00108                 cSunCoordinates results;
00109                 sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00110 
00111                 emit changeSunLight( results.dAzimuth * tgc::Degree ,results.dZenithAngle * tgc::Degree );
00112         }
00113 
00114 }
00115 
00116 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ChangeDate()
00117 {
00118         CalculateSunPosition();
00119 }
00120 
00121 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ChangeLongitude( double /*longitude*/ )
00122 {
00123         CalculateSunPosition();
00124 }
00125 
00126 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ChangeLatitude( double /*latitude*/ )
00127 {
00128         CalculateSunPosition();
00129 }
00130 
00131 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ChangeSunTime( QTime /*time*/ )
00132 {
00133         CalculateSunPosition();
00134 }
00135 
00136 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ChangeSunTimeZone( int /*timeZone*/ )
00137 {
00138         CalculateSunPosition();
00139 }
00140 
00141 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::on_selectButton_clicked()
00142 {
00143         MapDialog marbleDialog;
00144         marbleDialog.SetHomePosition( longitudeSpin->value(), latitudeSpin->value() );
00145         if( marbleDialog.exec() )
00146         {
00147                 double longitude;
00148                 double latitude;
00149                 marbleDialog.GetHomePosition( longitude, latitude );
00150 
00151         longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude );
00152         latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude );
00153     }
00154 }
00155 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::CalculateSunPosition()
00156 {
00157 
00158         //Fecha y Hora
00159         QDateTime time = GetTime();
00160 
00161         int year = time.date().year();
00162         int month = time.date().month();
00163         int day = time.date().day();
00164 
00165         double hours = time.time().hour ();
00166         double minutes = time.time().minute ();
00167         double seconds = time.time().second ();
00168         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00169 
00170         //Localization
00171         double longitude = longitudeSpin->value();
00172         double latitude = latitudeSpin->value();
00173     cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00174 
00175         //Calculate sun position
00176         cSunCoordinates results;
00177         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00178 
00179     emit changeRepresentation(results);
00180 }
00181 
00182 QDateTime SunPositionCalculatorDialog::GetTime()
00183 {
00184         QTime time = utRadio->isChecked() ? utTime->time() : ctTime->time().addSecs( - zoneSpin->value() * 3600 );
00185 
00186         QDateTime dateTime( calendarWidget->selectedDate(), time );
00187         return dateTime;
00188 
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::ReadSettings()
00193 {
00194         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00195         calendarWidget->setSelectedDate( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.date" ).toDate() );
00196 
00197 
00198         utRadio->setChecked( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.utTimeSelected", true ).toBool() );
00199         ctRadio->setChecked( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.ctTimeSelected", false  ).toBool() );
00200         utTime->setTime( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.utTime" ).toTime() );
00201         ctTime->setTime( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.ctTime" ).toTime() );
00202         zoneSpin->setValue( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.zone", 0 ).toInt() );
00203         latitudeSpin->setValue( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.latitude", 0 ).toDouble() );
00204         longitudeSpin->setValue( settings.value( "sunpositioncalculator.longitude", 0 ).toDouble() );
00205 }
00206 
00207 void SunPositionCalculatorDialog::WriteSettings()
00208 {
00209         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00210         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.date", calendarWidget->selectedDate() );
00211 
00212         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.utTimeSelected", utRadio->isChecked() );
00213         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.ctTimeSelected", ctRadio->isChecked() );
00214         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.utTime", utTime->time() );
00215         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.ctTime", ctTime->time() );
00216         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.zone", zoneSpin->value() );
00217         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.latitude", latitudeSpin->value() );
00218         settings.setValue( "sunpositioncalculator.longitude", longitudeSpin->value() );
00219 
00220 }
00221 #endif /* NO_MARBLE*/
